root.name: Transformers: Revenge of the Fallen
root.description: OverviewTransformers: Revenge of the Fallen is a movie tie-in game and sequel to the original Transformers game. It features campaigns for both factions in the Transformers universe, the Autobots and Decepticons. The PS2/Wii and PSP versions of Transformers: Revenge of the Fallen are an entirely different game and thus have their own page. The DS versions of Transformers: Revenge of the Fallen are again released separately in an Autobot and Decepticon campaign version.GameplayBasic gameplay in Transformers: Revenge of the Fallen is a third-person shooter with robots that can transform into cars to get away or to rush the enemy.
